channel.title: *PK Kingdom Recruiting*
channel.description:
We need more web disigners and forum admins and mods...
Heres some stats: we have 4500+ players we have atleast 10-25 people on at a time we are one of the more popular pk servers
So we need more web disigners and forum mods and admins
[center][b]Forum Admins[/b][/center] [center]-[/center] [center]-[/center] [center]-[/center]
[center][b]Forum Mods[/b][/center] [center]-[/center] [center]-[/center] [center]-[/center]
[center][b]Web Disigners[/b][/center] [center]-[/center] [center]-[/center] [center]-[/center]
All Web disigners will get forum mod
*Application#: *Name: *In-Game Name: Aim: MSN: Xfire: *How long do you play: Past Projects:
*s Are required For Application # put 1 for forum admin, 2 for forum mod, put 3 for web disigner
Thanks, elemenation2
